name: Mr. Moos' Adventure - Demo Game
description:
Keyboard Controls
Up - ArrowUp, w
Down - ArrowDown, s
Left - ArrowLeft, a
Right - ArrowRight, d
A - alt, z, j
B - ctrl, k, x
Start - enter
Select - shift

Thanks to Chris Maltby for making GB Studio accessible to a complete novice!
https://chrismaltby.itch.io/
Thanks to Final Boss Blues and Chasers Gaming for some tilesets.
https://finalbossblues.itch.io/
https://chasersgaming.itch.io/
Thanks to Pixel Pete for some great YouTube Tutorials!
https://petermilko.itch.io/
